body.name: IDS & UNITELM S.R.L.
body.summary:
Responsible for the technology stacks of new projects. I have developed REST/GraphQL Backends, SPAs and a javascript library to view and edit CAD files on the browser using WebGL.

I have developed several plugins and themes for the wordpress ecosystem.

body.name: Seed Srl
body.summary:
I have developed a push notification backend application to collect and segment mobile devices.

I was responsible for the design and development of apps for iOS and android.

body.name: 3Keys.it
body.summary: I have developed web applications in the area of food, travel and art based on Yii framework.

body.name: Cosvifor srl
body.summary: Team leader and designer of backend applications. I developed software tools like CRM and CMS for the corporate infrastructure.

body.name: IS-LM s.r.l.
body.summary:
I developed web applications in the field of job offer and population census for a European Union project.

This experience gave me the opportunity to travel abroad for the presentation of my work

body.summary: Developing websites, plugins and themes based on wordpress.
